description: We use a combination of double-fold Mexican vanilla extract and Madagascar bourbon vanilla paste for this classic flavor.
Made with cocoa powder and Callebaut chocolate.
Vanilla ice cream with Oreo sandwich cookie pieces.
Made with butter, cream, and lots of coarse sea salt, this is our most popular flavor.
Made with cold-brewed Bean Traders espresso beans and sweetened condensed milk.
Blackberry cream cheese base with gluten free almond cookie crumbles
A malty milk chocolate base, with crumbs of cookies throughout
Vanilla ice cream with chocolate-raspberry truffles and raspberry swirl.

Probably the most interesting ice cream weâ€™ve made; the recipe is from Old Lyme Ice Cream in Connecticut! A base of rosewater, cardamom, cinnamon, and pomegranate, with pieces of dates, figs, apricots, and pistachios mixed in.

The vegan counterpart to our wildly popular Salted Butter Caramel. We caramelize sugar, skipping the butter and cream, and add it to a coconut milk and pea protein base. The coconut is noticeable but not dominant and blends deliciously with the caramel flavor.
vegan coffee base with sandwich cookie pieces!
